about_the_game:
overview


In the world of Wild House in the Mountains, there are many gods, and you will play as one of the "mountain gods" to fulfill the instructions of the "Lian Ji Senshang" to take care of and teach people. Not only can you learn to grow, grow a variety of crops; It is also possible to cook, make delicious dishes; Not only can you collect resources and exchange what you need; It is also possible to make furniture and decorate the environment.

Leisurely time


In this world, you will enjoy a relaxing time in a quiet and peaceful environment, without pressure, anxiety, and tension.

The expectation of harvesting


Depending on the season, many varieties of crops can be grown, as well as medicines for disease and healing, as well as special purpose textile crops and ornamental plants.

Accumulation of collections


Cutting wood, harvesting weeds, digging ore, clearing fields, the resources collected bring great satisfaction.

The moment of manufacture


The collected resources can be used to craft different items, some of which have special functions, such as storage. Or use the harvested results to make food.

Lovely friends


There are many gods here - mountain gods, river gods, lake gods, wind gods, although they are not much different, they are all cute.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 730
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: In this world, God is born beside immortals and listens to their teachings. Then the immortals created people in the hope that God would take care of and teach people. As a mountain god, after the immortal leaves, can you fulfill his instructions before leaving?
